name: 8 Bit Son-of-a-Bitch
storyline: Michael J. Wolf and his band Wolf-Face have conquered the film and music industries and now they conquer the VIDEO GAME INDUSTRY. Finally, you and your family can experience what it's like to be a teenage werewolf rock-n-roll god from the comfort of your living room. Take control of Michael J. Wolf as he navigates several challenging levels in order to make it to the basketball game on time and win the heart of his true love Boof. Avoid and destroy the maniacal Owen and Lars in order to get the girl and save the town from a losing basketball season.
summary: Video game created by and featuring the punk band Wolf-Face. Help Michael J. Wolf make it to the basketball game on time, while also capturing the heart of his true love Boof. Avoid and destroy the maniacal Owen and Lars to save the town.
